      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void deleteDevice(Device device)
      method to delete a given device, remove all entities first and then finally delete the device itself.
      void init(FloodlightModuleContext fmc)
      This is a hook for each module to do its internal initialization, e.g., call setService(context.getService("Service")) All module dependencies are resolved when this is called, but not every module is initialized.
      IDevice learnEntity(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.MacAddress macAddress, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.VlanVid vlan, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.IPv4Address ipv4Address, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.IPv6Address ipv6Address, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId switchDPID, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort switchPort)

      • setEntityClassifier

        public void setEntityClassifier(IEntityClassifierService ecs)
        Set a new IEntityClassifier Use this as a quick way to use a particular entity classifier in a single test without having to setup the full FloodlightModuleContext again.
        参数:
        ecs -

      • learnEntity

        public IDevice learnEntity(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.MacAddress macAddress,
                  org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.VlanVid vlan,
                  org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.IPv4Address ipv4Address,
                  org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.IPv6Address ipv6Address,
                  org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId switchDPID,
                  org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort switchPort,
                  boolean processUpdates)
        Learn a device using the given characteristics.
        参数:
        macAddress - the MAC
        vlan - the VLAN (can be VlanVid.ZERO for untagged)
        ipv4Address - the IPv4 (can be IPv4Address.NONE)
        ipv6Address - the IPv6 (can be IPv6Address.NONE)
        switchDPID - the attachment point switch DPID (can be DatapathId.NONE)
        switchPort - the attachment point switch port (can be OFPort.ZERO)
        processUpdates - if false, will not send updates. Note that this method is not thread safe if this is false
        返回:
        the device, either new or not

      • deleteDevice

        public void deleteDevice(Device device)
        从类复制的说明: DeviceManagerImpl
        method to delete a given device, remove all entities first and then finally delete the device itself.

      • learnEntity

        public IDevice learnEntity(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.MacAddress macAddress,
                  org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.VlanVid vlan,
                  org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.IPv4Address ipv4Address,
                  org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.IPv6Address ipv6Address,
                  org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId switchDPID,
                  org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort switchPort)
        Learn a device using the given characteristics.
        参数:
        macAddress - the MAC
        vlan - the VLAN (can be VlanVid.ZERO for untagged)
        ipv4Address - the IPv4 (can be IPv4Address.NONE)
        ipv6Address - the IPv6 (can be IPv6Address.NONE)
        switchDPID - the attachment point switch DPID (can be DatapathId.NONE)
        switchPort - the attachment point switch port (can be OFPort.ZERO)
        返回:
        the device, either new or not

      • init

        public void init(FloodlightModuleContext fmc)
          throws FloodlightModuleException
        从接口复制的说明: IFloodlightModule
        This is a hook for each module to do its internal initialization, e.g., call setService(context.getService("Service")) All module dependencies are resolved when this is called, but not every module is initialized.
        指定者:
        init 在接口中 IFloodlightModule
        覆盖:
        init 在类中 DeviceManagerImpl
        抛出:
        FloodlightModuleException
